{ "success": true, "message": "Building details fetched successfully", "data": { "id": 16, "buildingId": 7, "emailId": 12, "issueName": "Front Passenger Lift Counterweight Painting", "issueDesc": "Counterweight needs to be painted safety yellow.", "issueCategory": "Maintenance", "issueStatus": "NOT_STARTED", "issuePriority": "High", "assignedTo": null, "createdDate": "2025-08-14T17:24:04.785061", "dueDate": null, "latestUpdate": null, "lastUpdateDate": null, "lastUpdateBy": null, "lastUpdateMethod": null, "relatedCommunications": [ { "messageId": "759174eb-2940-4361-83ee-af38f87576e8", "inReplyTo": "", "fromEmail": "osamaaaiq@gmail.com", "toEmail": "safaagge-4429@building.blocwise.co", "subject": "Front Passenger Lift Quote- Directors Approval Required", "bodyText": "Dear Directors,\n\n\n\n\n\nThe lift company has provided a quotation for works required for the front\npassenger lift, based on issues raised in the LOLER/Insurance reports and\nby their service engineers.\n\n\n\nThey strongly recommend urgent action for items in Sections A & B.\n\n\n\n - *Section A (Immediate Attention – LOLER Defect)*:\n - The emergency auto-dialler is inoperative, requiring reinstatement\n of the telephone line or installation of a GSM unit (£1,333.99).\n - *Section B (Performance & Reliability Improvements)*:\n - Install “Do Not Use Lift in Fire” signs (£178–£394.08).\n - Supply and store critical spare parts (£1,704.00).\n - *Section C (Health & Safety Compliance)*:\n - Install a 415V danger notice (£110.00).\n - Clean and paint the lift pit, add oil collector trays (£715.99).\n - Install a \"Beware Deep Pit\" notice (£110.00).\n - Paint the counterweight safety yellow (£631.99).\n\n\n\nPlease advise on how you wish to proceed\n", "bodyHtml": "

Dear Directors,

 

 

The lift company has provided a quotation for works required for the front passenger lift, based on issues raised in the LOLER/Insurance reports and by their service engineers.

 

They strongly recommend urgent action for items in Sections A & B.

 

  • Section A (Immediate Attention – LOLER Defect):
    • The emergency auto-dialler is inoperative, requiring reinstatement of the telephone line or installation of a GSM unit (£1,333.99).
  • Section B (Performance & Reliability Improvements):
    • Install “Do Not Use Lift in Fire” signs (£178–£394.08).
    • Supply and store critical spare parts (£1,704.00).
  • Section C (Health & Safety Compliance):
    • Install a 415V danger notice (£110.00).
    • Clean and paint the lift pit, add oil collector trays (£715.99).
    • Install a "Beware Deep Pit" notice (£110.00).
    • Paint the counterweight safety yellow (£631.99).

 

Please advise on how you wish to proceed

\n", "summary": "Quotation for urgent works needed on the front passenger lift based on safety reports." }, { "messageId": "27b9b547-2e46-4085-9bcf-635a0d9554bb", "inReplyTo": "759174eb-2940-4361-83ee-af38f87576e8", "fromEmail": "osamaaaiq@gmail.com", "toEmail": "safaagge-4429@building.blocwise.co", "subject": "AGM Agenda", "bodyText": "Hi George,\n\n\n\nI’m happy with the agenda you set out.\n\n\n\nJust as an FYI our meeting has been put back until Thursday now. We will\nconfirm as a group then if that’s ok ?\n\n\n\nMany thanks,\n\n\n\nPhil\n", "bodyHtml": "

Hi George,

 

I’m happy with the agenda you set out.

 

Just as an FYI our meeting has been put back until Thursday now. We will confirm as a group then if that’s ok ?

 

Many thanks,

 

Phil
